channel.title: True: LOL Lebron James got dunked on by a sophomore!
channel.description:
Lol, i heard about this from my friends at school about 2 days ago. I didn't believe until i decided to look up information about this. I expected some regular dunk, but I don't really think he got dunked on. If I was lebron James myself I wouldn't expect him to dunk because its likely to see someone dunk as a sophomore. But yeah Lebron Jumped late anyways and the guy was in the air already so sort of an excuse right there. Anyone its still funny that he got dunked on, the KING - lol.
Comment, also if your looking for videos on this u wont find it because a nike representative fagget took the video away :mad:. [url=http://sports.espn.go.com/nba/news/story?id=4315071]About tape confiscation[/url] [url=http://espn.go.com/video/clip?id=4316474]The guy who dunked on him[/url]
O well, comment how u think of this. If your a nerd who don't care gtfo, thanks; I think.

item.title: True: LOL Lebron James got dunked on by a sophomore!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:7, topic:288101”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=380906.msg2863537#msg2863537 date=1247322610]

Someone find a reason to ban this guy.

He’s black, do you need more reasons?
[/quote]

Yeah, he’s black.[/quote]

I was going to mention this but i thought, naahhh I don’t want to be the one to have a warning… and this is the kid who talked about his dick length…

but anyway isn’t dunking something you do in basket ball?
